title: About
text:
I am Robert W. Walker, an Associate Professor of Quantitative Methods in the Atkinson Graduate School of Management at Willamette University
My web presence is rww.science and my github is https://github.com/robertwwalker

title: Multiplex for PDX R Users Group
text:
This serves as the web organizing page for a talk on quarto in education specifically focused on the multiplex feature of reveal.js.
A link to the presentation is https://robertwwalker.github.io/pdxrug-talk/index.html
The code for the presentation can be found on github.
The code for the website can be found on github.
I now use the combination of quarto websites and reveal.js in most of my classes. Examples include:

My Essex Summer School course in Time Series and Panel Data
MBA Choice and Forecasting
